testimonials.message: I have been going to Halls of Beauty ever since Beverley started her own business and would never think of going anywhere else to have my nails done, even when Beverley was on maternity leave I waited for her to resume. I would highly recommend Halls of Beauty
testimonials.name: Lyn Skinner

testimonials.message: Halls of Beauty offers a warm, caring and friendly service, yet very professional. The treatment room is spotless, smells good and is very comfortable. A good range of treatments which are reasonably priced and professionally done. No parking or traffic problems. Highly Recommended.
testimonials.name: Sally Louth

testimonials.message: I went to Halls of Beauty for an Indian Head Massage. I wasn't sure what to expect, I found the room calm and relaxing and the music was just the right level and made the massage more enjoyable. I thoroughly enjoyed the massage and since then I haven't had another one elsewhere that's been as good as Bev's. I would recommend her to anyone.
testimonials.name: Carly Harlock
